name: Spike Sledding!
description:
Fulfill your desires of zipping across the ice with your sled, a harpoon, and a dream!  Race to see how fast you can complete our courses, getting a higher score for faster times.

Controls

Spacebar - Boost Forward

X - Brake

Left Mouse Button - Shoot harpoon.  Hold to attach rope.  Let go to release.

Mouse Scroll - Adjust Rope Length

Game Developers

Jarimey Rada

Matthew King

Tiana Thompson

Sound Sources

Knife Stab Pull:

Sound Effect from Pixabay

Woosh:

Sound Effect from Pixabay
